chinese: Brain,你正在下足球赛的赌注吗?
english: Are you doing the football pools, Brain?

chinese: 我敢肯定这星期我们会赢点什么的.
english: I'm sure we'll win something this week.

chinese: 你老是那样说,但是我们从来没赢过!
english: You always say that, but we never win anything!

chinese: 要是你赢了许多钱,你会做什么呢?
english: What will you do if you win a lot of money?

chinese: 要是我赢了许多钱,我给你买件貂皮大衣.
english: If I win a lot of money I'll buy you a mink coat!
I don't want a mink coat!
I want to see the world.

chinese: 好的.要是我们赢了很多钱,
english: All right. If we win a lot of money,

chinese: 我们就去周游世界,并且住最好的旅馆.
english: We'll travel round the world and we'll stay at the best hotels.

chinese: 然后我们返回家园,在乡下买幢大房子.
english: Then we'll return home and buy a big house in the country.

chinese: 我们将有一个漂亮的花园和……
english: We'll have a beautiful garden and ...

chinese: 但是如果我们把所有那些钱都花光了,我们又会变穷的.
english: But if we spend all that money we'll be poor again.

chinese: 如果我们花光了所有钱,我们设法在足球赛赌注上再赢一次.
english: If we spend all the money, we'll try and win the football pools again.

chinese: 这是个美好的梦,但一切都取决于“如果”!
english: It's a pleasant dream but everything depends on 'if'!
